name: Executive Office Chair
description: Ergonomic executive office chair with adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable mesh back. Perfect for long hours of work.

name: Premium Desk Lamp
description: LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature, touch control, and USB charging port.

name: Standing Desk Converter
description: Adjustable standing desk converter with spacious work surface and easy height adjustment for sitting or standing.

name: Leather Office Chair Mat
description: Premium leather office chair mat for hardwood floors, providing smooth chair movement and floor protection.

name: Filing Cabinet
description: 3-drawer metal filing cabinet with lockable drawers and anti-tilt mechanism for secure storage of documents.

name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo
description: Sleek wireless keyboard and mouse combo with ergonomic design, long battery life, and reliable wireless connection.

name: Conference Room Table
description: Large conference room table with durable laminate surface, cable management system, and seating for up to 10 people.

name: Office Organizer Set
description: 6-piece office organizer set including desk tray, pen holder, file organizer, and sticky note dispenser.

name: Adjustable Monitor Stand
description: Adjustable monitor stand with built-in drawer and riser for ergonomic viewing height and additional desk space.

name: Mesh Office Chair
description: Comfortable mesh office chair with adjustable armrests, lumbar support, and 360-degree swivel for optimal comfort.
